ygData.subject: Re: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: On Mon, 8 Nov 1999 09:46:31 -0600 , James Schuldes  ... I spent the whole night in Kithicor, sat in the burned out cabin while my cleric
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 8 Nov 1999 09:46:31 -0600 , James Schuldes <jgs@...>
wrote:

>I have been camping the West Common zone and Rivervale Zone. I start to see
>things on tracking as early as 7pm and by 9pm the list is full. One pull at
>9pm by RV zone and enough other stuff agros on our fites until the they quit
>spawning around 4am to 6am. From then til 10 or noonish, you need a cleric
>or pallie to cast sense undead which will see the few that are left over -
>but beware sense undead will see all the way across the zone.

I spent the whole night in Kithicor, sat in the burned out cabin while
my cleric friend ran from north karana to collect the book that spawns
there. In that time I saw nothing but the usual bixies and orcs on
tracking. No undead, not even a normal ghoul. I have spoken to other
people on the server some of whom wanted to hunt the undead spawn in
Kithicor, and it seems that, on Rodcet Nife at least, Kithicor has
returned to its original pre-haloween state.

I don't know if this applies to other servers or whether Rodcet
himself has intervened and removed the undead from the server that
bears him name.

Linani Llarieidd'dra
Bard, Level 36, Rodcet Nife
